mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRIL_NOUSERRESERVATION(res_seq, RES_PWD, PD_SEQ, PD_NAME, PD_STARTDATE, PD_ENDDATE, ADULT_NUM, TEENAGER_NUM, PET_NUM, ADULT_PRICE, TEENAGER_PRICE, PET_PRICE, RES_PRICE, RES_PEOPLE, RES_NAME, RES_BIRTH, RES_EMAIL, RES_COMMENT, RES_PHONE) values(RES_SEQ.nextVal,#{res_pwd},#{pd_seq},#{pd_name},#{pd_startDate},#{pd_endDate}, #{adult_num},#{teenager_num},#{pet_num},#{adult_price},#{teenager_price},#{pet_price},#{res_price},#{res_people}, #{res_name},#{res_birth},#{res_email},#{res_comment},#{res_phone})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Tril_NOUSERRESERVATION ORDER BY res_seq ASC
select * from Tril_NOUSERRESERVATION where res_email=#{res_email} AND res_pwd=#{res_pwd}

SELECT res_seq,res_pwd, pd_seq, pd_name, pd_startDate, pd_endDate, adult_num, teenager_num, pet_num, adult_price, teenager_price, pet_price, res_price, res_people, res_name, res_birth, res_email, res_comment, res_phone FROM ( SELECT res_seq, res_pwd, pd_seq, pd_name, pd_startDate, pd_endDate, adult_num, teenager_num, pet_num, adult_price, teenager_price, pet_price, res_price, res_people, res_name, res_birth, res_email, res_comment, res_phone, ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY res_seq ASC) AS rn FROM Tril_NOUSERRESERVATION ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY res_seq ASC
select count(res_seq) from Tril_NOUSERRESERVATION where res_seq>0
